availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nicholas M. Spalding (Nelson County, KY, merchant)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Stanislaus Spalding & Margaret A. Spalding. Married to Malvina C. Simms Spalding in Nelson County, Kentucky, on September 28, 1859. Father of Edward Spalding and William Spalding. Student in Nelson County in 1850. Merchant in Nelson County in 1860. Merchant in Nelson County in 1863.

ab.bibl:

Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Film #000481488, Nelson County, September 28, 1859.
